body_html:
Now it works ! I suggest you to create a link to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.7/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md
in the installation section of the site. It could be easy for users with the same problem.

Thanks

body:
Now it works ! I suggest you to create a link to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.7/tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md
in the installation section of the site. It could be easy for users with the same problem.

Thanks
